message: Hello I wonder if one of you have ever seen an ORM that deals with remote sql using web-service and makes caching on the device that's running on ??

data.message: Some database engines would expose REST APIs. That's one. Another, you can build OData service (which will allow you to expose some data and give the client the ability to make filter/paging/order/etc calls via just web requests without you doing anything other than exposing an IQueryable)
